import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import allblog from '../blogdata/blog.json' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' const PostLarge = () => { var path = 'images/blogimage/blogbg.jpeg' var divStyle = { backgroundImage: 'url(/' + path + ')', backgroundPosition: 'bottom' } return ( <>

Blog

We offer a great place to work for all our associates by providing the best facilities,
rewards & growth programs on a continual basis to support both, your personal and professional growth.

{ allblog.data.map((items, i) => { return ( <>

{items.blogTitle}

HD
{items.blogCategory}
{items.postedOn}
) }) }
) } export default PostLarge
